New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 6 月 21 日星期五 06:15:28 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Wellington Mayor Tory Whanau to push ahead with airport sale despite split council https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-mayor-tory-whanau-to-push-ahead-with-airport-sale-despite-split-council/G3Q2DSB6UJDSHAEV365NQPIZX4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-mayor-tory-whanau-to-push-ahead-with-airport-sale-despite-split-council/G3Q2DSB6UJDSHAEV365NQPIZX4/ Georgina CampbellIf the same vote to sell the council's shares was held tomorrow, it would fail. Fri, 21 Jun 2024 06:04:22 +0000 Wellington Mayor Tory Whanau is proceeding with selling the council's 34 per cent share in the airport.
Taranaki mattress murder trial: Leigh Beer has a history of drunken, violent offending https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/taranaki-mattress-murder-Trial-leigh-beer-has-a-history-of-drunken-violent-offending/NWFBUPSSFBCZBEVCGZYDKNXA54/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/taranaki-mattress-murder-Trial-leigh-beer-has-a-history-of-drunken-violent-offending/NWFBUPSSFBCZBEVCGZYDKNXA54/ Tara ShaskeyLeigh Beer has been found guilty of murdering Emma Field. Now his history can be revealed. Fri, 21 Jun 2024 05:44:45 +0000 Emma Field's body was found after a fire that ripped through her New Plymouth flat on May 27, 2022. Now, her partner Leigh Matthew Frederick Beer has been found guilty of her murder.
Winston Peters’ demand Sport NZ re-writes transgender policy disappears in ‘no comment’ vortex https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/winston-peters-demand-sport-nz-re-writes-transgender-policy-disappears-in-no-comment-vortex/KXGSL2SR2JFM3FGL4DL7CYQ4II/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/winston-peters-demand-sport-nz-re-writes-transgender-policy-disappears-in-no-comment-vortex/KXGSL2SR2JFM3FGL4DL7CYQ4II/ Adam PearseIt's unclear whether the NZ First leader will follow up on his demand. Fri, 21 Jun 2024 05:18:11 +0000 New Zealand First leader Winston Peters says he wants Sport NZ to perform a re-write but Sports Minister Chris Bishop (right) isn't saying whether he agrees. Photo / Mark Mitchell
Serious crash reported on State Highway 3 at Te Awamutu https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/serious-crash-reported-on-state-highway-3-at-te-awamutu/MMC36YC6IFG2NK763MHZ7FMO3A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/serious-crash-reported-on-state-highway-3-at-te-awamutu/MMC36YC6IFG2NK763MHZ7FMO3A/ Diversions are in place and motorists are advised to take an alternative route. Fri, 21 Jun 2024 05:15:02 +0000 A serious crash on State Highway 3, Te Awamutu involving a tractor has been reported to emergency services.
Emergency services rush to State Highway 1 at Ātiamuri after medical event first reported as six-car crash https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/emergency-services-rush-to-state-highway-1-at-atiamuri-after-medical-event-first-reported-as-六车相撞/FGSTGYLU6JCALEW35J6UGSHKEU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/emergency-services-rush-to-state-highway-1-at-atiamuri-after-medical-event-first-reported-as-六车相撞/FGSTGYLU6JCALEW35J6UGSHKEU/ Maryana GarciaCrews were 'thinking the worst' after being told of a six-car crash. Fri, 21 Jun 2024 05:00:37 +0000 Four Fire and Emergency vehicles and three ambulances were dispatched to State Highway 1 at Ātiamuri this afternoon.
Auckland Airport CCTV shows Air NZ baggage handler unload secret meth stash from flight https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-airport-cctv-shows-air-nz-baggage-handler-unload-secret-meth-stash-from-flight/32OFR64UUNG2RCKMAX3WGQVBOU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-airport-cctv-shows-air-nz-baggage-handler-unload-secret-meth-stash-from-flight/32OFR64UUNG2RCKMAX3WGQVBOU/ Craig KapitanThe footage has been released to the Herald after it was played for jurors today. Fri, 21 Jun 2024 04:43:21 +0000 An Air NZ baggage handler at Auckland Airport who has pleaded guilty to helping unload a secret stash of methamphetamine from an arriving Malaysian Airlines flight was caught on camera in the act. Photo / Supplied
Health NZ recruitment pause: Union claims frontline roles impacted https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/health-nz-recruitment-pause-union-claims-frontline-roles-impacted/E2U2YYBI2FFFDJZRVGXXRHA6TM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/health-nz-recruitment-pause-union-claims-frontline-roles-impacted/E2U2YYBI2FFFDJZRVGXXRHA6TM/ Megan WilsonHealth NZ says regional forums will approve recruitment 'where appropriate'. Bay View water back to normal after estuary pipeline repairs https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/bay-view-water-back-to-normal-after-estuary-pipeline-repairs/TWEZKXRHNFGHBHQPDIKWRBRKEQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/bay-view-water-back-to-normal-after-estuary-pipeline-repairs/TWEZKXRHNFGHBHQPDIKWRBRKEQ/ Doug LaingCity council announced the calamity on April 23.
